newsitem.title: USA: Brooks Fiber, SBC sign agreement.
newsitem.headline: Brooks Fiber, SBC sign agreement.

text.p: Brooks Fiber Properties Inc said Wednesday it entered an interconnection agreement with Southwestern Bell, a unit of SBC Communications Inc.

It said the agreement will pave the way for Brooks Fiber Communications of Arkansas Inc, Brooks Fiber Communications of Oklahoma Inc and Brooks Fiber Communications of Tulsa Inc -- wholly owned Brooks Fiber subsidiaries -- to begin providing local exchange services in Southwestern Bell's service areas in Oklahoma and Arkansas.
This is the first such agreement between Southwesstern Bell and any competitive local exchange carrier in Oklahoma.
